data.eml:eml: A revision of the Xestia (Radddea) alexis (Kozhanchikov, 1928) species-group with a checklist of subgenus Raddea Alphéraky, 1892 and description of brachipterous females (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Noctuinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kononenko, Vladimir S., Volynkin, Anton V., Yu, Alexei (2012): A revision of the Xestia (Radddea) alexis (Kozhanchikov, 1928) species-group with a checklist of subgenus Raddea Alphéraky, 1892 and description of brachipterous females (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Noctuinae). Zootaxa 3590: 51-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.283165
